sen.j: 工芸科学部１学部で構成される工科大学で、それ程大きな規模の大学ではないが、バイオ、材料、情報、環境などの先端科学技術分野から造形・デザインまでの幅広い分野において、ものづくりを基盤とした「実学」を目指した個性ある教育研究を行っている。
sen.e: Kyoto Institute of Technology (KIT) has only one school, that is, School of Science and Technology, so it's not that big in scale, but its education and research is unique in pursuing "practical science" based on creating products, ranging widely from the cutting-edge science and technology, such as biotech, material, information, and environment, to formative arts and design.

Kyoto Institute of Technology (KIT) has only one school, that is, School of Science and Technology, so it's not that big in scale, but its education and research are unique in pursuing "practical science" based on creating products, ranging widely from the cutting-edge science and technology, such as biotechnology, material, information, and environment, to formative arts and design.
sen.cmt: is→are its education and research とあるので、複数形に修正。 biotech→biotechnology 口語表現を修正。
sen.e: Kyoto Institute of Technology (KIT) has only one school, that is, School of Science and Technology, so it's not that big in scale, but its education and research are unique in pursuing "practical science" based on creating products, ranging widely from the cutting-edge science and technology, such as biotechnology, material, information, and environment, to formative arts and design.

sen.j: また、芸術系の学科を持つ工科大学として、有機的な教育カリキュラムによる『科学と芸術の融合』を掲げ、感性豊かな国際的工科大学を目指す。
sen.e: And, having the departments related to art, KIT tries "the fusion of science and art" through its organic education curriculum, attempting to become an international, sensibility-rich institute.
And, having the departments related to art, KIT tries "the fusion of science and art" through its organic education curriculum, attempting to become an international, sensibility-rich institute.
And, having the departments related to art, KIT tries "the fusion of science and art" through its organic education curriculum, attempting to become an international, sensibility-rich institute.

sen.j: 1899年 京都蚕業講習所開設
sen.e: In 1899, Kyoto College of Textile Fibers was founded.
In 1899, Kyoto College of Textile Fibers was founded.
In 1899, Kyoto College of Textile Fibers was founded.

sen.j: 1902年 京都高等工芸学校設立
sen.e: In 1902, Kyoto College of Technology was founded.
In 1902, Kyoto College of Technology was founded.
In 1902, Kyoto College of Technology was founded.

sen.j: 1914年 京都高等蚕業学校設立
sen.e: In 1914, Kyoto Institute of Textile Fibers was founded.
In 1914, Kyoto Institute of Textile Fibers was founded.
In 1914, Kyoto Institute of Textile Fibers was founded.

sen.j: 1931年 京都高等蚕業学校を京都高等蚕糸学校と改称
sen.e: In 1931, Kyoto Institute of Textile Fibers was renamed Kyoto Institute of Textile Thread.
In 1931, Kyoto Institute of Textile Fibers was renamed Kyoto Institute of Textile Thread.
In 1931, Kyoto Institute of Textile Fibers was renamed Kyoto Institute of Textile Thread.

sen.j: 1944年 京都高等工芸学校を京都工業専門学校と改称、京都高等蚕糸学校を京都繊維専門学校と改称
sen.e: In 1944, Kyoto College of Technology was renamed Kyoto Vocational College of Technology, and Kyoto Institute of Textile Thread was renamed Kyoto Vocational College of Textile.
In 1944, Kyoto College of Technology was renamed Kyoto Vocational College of Technology, and Kyoto Institute of Textile Thread was renamed Kyoto Vocational College of Textile.
In 1944, Kyoto College of Technology was renamed Kyoto Vocational College of Technology, and Kyoto Institute of Textile Thread was renamed Kyoto Vocational College of Textile.

sen.j: 1949年 京都工業専門学校・京都繊維専門学校を母体として新制大学京都工芸繊維大学発足、工芸学部・繊維学部設置
sen.e: In 1949, based on two vocational colleges above, KIT started as a college under the new system, and opened School of Engineering and Design, and School of Textile Science.
In 1949, based on two vocational colleges above, KIT started as a college under the new system, and opened School of Engineering and Design, and School of Textile Science.
In 1949, based on two vocational colleges above, KIT started as a college under the new system, and opened School of Engineering and Design, and School of Textile Science.

sen.j: 1951年 京都工芸繊維大学工業短期大学部併設
sen.e: In 1951, Technical College of KIT was established within the premises.
In 1951, Technical College of KIT was established within the premises.
In 1951, Technical College of KIT was established within the premises.

sen.j: 1992年 京都工芸繊維大学工業短期大学部廃止
sen.e: In 1992, Technical College of KIT was closed.
In 1992, Technical College of KIT was closed.
In 1992, Technical College of KIT was closed.

sen.j: 2004年 国立大学法人法により、国立大学法人へ移行
sen.e: In 2004, KIT was transformed into the national university corporation by the National University Corporation Law.
In 2004, KIT was transformed into the national university corporation by the National University Corporation Law.
In 2004, KIT was transformed into the national university corporation by the National University Corporation Law.

sen.j: 2006年 工芸学部と繊維学部を統合し工芸科学部設置
sen.e: In 2006, School of Engineering and Design, and School of Textile Science were united into School of Science and Technology.
In 2006, School of Engineering and Design, and School of Textile Science were united into School of Science and Technology.

tit.j: 学生と教員の共同プロジェクト
tit.e: Joint Projects between Students and Teachers
Joint Projects between Students and Teachers
Joint Projects between Students and Teachers

sen.j: 学生と教員の共同プロジェクトとは、学外で開催される物づくりに関連するイベントや大会に向けての学生と教員の取り組みを、大学が財政面で支援する活動のことである。
sen.e: "Joint Projects between Students and Teachers" are KIT-sponsored activities in which its students and teachers team up for taking part in contests or events held outside of KIT.

"Joint Projects between Students and Teachers" are KIT-sponsored activities in which its students and teachers team up for taking part in events or contests related to manufacturing held outside of KIT.
sen.cmt: 原文の、”物作りに関する”が抜けているので補足。
sen.e: "Joint Projects between Students and Teachers" are KIT-sponsored activities in which its students and teachers team up for taking part in events or contests related to manufacturing held outside of KIT.

sen.j: 活動は2006年度より始まった。

sen.cmt: 原文に ()が付くが、意味不明。これは必要ですか？

sen.j: 2006年4月に澤田祐一准教授の呼びかけで学生と教員の共同プロジェクトとして開始される。
sen.e: In April, 2006, Associate Professor Yuichi SAWADA proposed the project, and it started as a cooperative one between students and teachers.

sen.j: 2007年6月に東京で行われたNHK大学ロボコン2007年に初出場した。
sen.e: In June, 2006, they took part in College Category of NHK Robot Contest 2007 in Tokyo.
In June, 2006, they took part in College Category of NHK Robot Contest 2007 in Tokyo.
In June, 2006, they took part in College Category of NHK Robot Contest 2007 in Tokyo.

sen.j: 予選リーグでは初戦の千葉大学戦を1対0で初勝利し、続く神奈川工科大学戦も1対0で勝利を、予選順位7位で決勝トーナメントに進出する。
sen.e: In the preliminary, they won with a score of 1-0 against Chiba University's team, and then won with the same score against Kanagawa Institute of Technology's team, so they were qualified for the championship tournament at the seventh rank.

sen.j: 決勝トーナメントでは優勝した金沢工業大学に30対0で敗れた。
sen.e: But in the championship tournament, they were defeated with a score of 30-0 against Kanazawa Institute of Technology's team, the champion 2007.
But in the championship tournament, they were defeated with a score of 30-0 against Kanazawa Institute of Technology's team, the champion 2007.

sen.j: 学生フォーミュラプロジェクト ()

sen.j: 2005年秋、グランデルフィーノは学生フォーミュラ製作チームとして自動車部のメンバーにより同志を募り創立し、本学初の「学生と教員の共同プロジェクト」として動き始める。
sen.e: In Autumn, 2005, "Grandelfino" was founded as a team for producing a student formula car by like-minded people in KIT, gathered by its car club members,
In Autumn, 2005, "Grandelfino" was founded as a team for producing a student formula car by like-minded people in KIT, gathered by its car club members,

sen.j: 2007年夏、全日本学生フォーミュラ大会に参戦。
sen.e: In Summer, 2007, Grandelfino took part in Student Formula SAE Competition of JAPAN.

sen.j: 28チームが完走したエンデュランスの完走を果たす。
sen.e: And its car managed to run till the end of the Endurance Check Category of the Competition, in which 28 teams did the same.
And its car managed to run till the end of the Endurance Check Category of the Competition, in which 28 teams did the same.

It ranked the 52nd out of 61 teams.

sen.j: チーム名であるGrandelfinoとは、イタリア語のイルカと、大きな、壮大な、というグランドを掛け合わせて作った造語。
sen.e: The team's name Grandelfino is a coinage made of the words "Delfino", an Italian word for dolphin, and "Grand", meaning great or magnificent.
The team's name Grandelfino is a coinage made of the words "Delfino", an Italian word for dolphin, and "Grand", meaning great or magnificent.

sen.j: 例年11月の第三週金曜日～日曜日にかけての三日間で行われる。
sen.e: It's held over three days from the third Friday until Sunday every November.
It's held over three days from the third Friday until Sunday every November.
It's held over three days from the third Friday until Sunday every November.

sen.j: 前後日も準備・後片付けのため休校となる。
sen.e: KIT is off not only on those three days but on the day before and after the festival for its preparation and cleanup.

sen.j: かつてノーベル賞受賞者の福井謙一が学長を務めたことがある。
sen.e: Ken'ichi FUKUI, the Nobel Prize winner, once headed KIT.
Kenichi FUKUI, the Nobel prize winner, has ever acted as the president of KIT.

sen.j: 平成19年度の一級建築士の合格者人数が国立大学中1位である。
sen.e: In fiscal Heisei 19, KIT ranked the first of all national colleges at the number of successful candidates who took the test of the first-class registered architect.

sen.e: '妙''法', known as "Gozan no Okuribi", can be seen nearby from the campus.
